replies.body: Im still waiting for Riot to give me dread nova Darius, no way im spending $100000 on boxes to get 3 gemstones

1. 10 gemstones
2. They will never put Dreadnova Darius on sale, as he is a hextech exclusive skin.

you can get him from chest though
hextech shards

I got Hextech Annie and have 9 Gemstones towards Vayne. And for the most part I just earned chests with champions, ran out of champions to earn them with last season. Takes more time, but a hell of alot cheaper
When can we hope to see Camille {{champion:164}} discounted?
Buy champs with IP, Skins with RP
Yeah but what if we want to gift it to someone?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Yeah I wanted to ask this too

Pretty sure the champ/skin has to exist for a year minimum before it's added to the list of champs/skins that can go on sale. Early sales where they're discounted at 33% off (rather than the 50% of normal sales) happen about 6 months after release. So for Camille, that'd be May/June sometime probably. If champs even get early sales. I dunno if they do.

I don't think champions appear in early sale, but could be wrong about that, and I was afraid the year wait applied to champions :(

Would be nice if I didn't have to waste IP on runes, but I guess I'll have to wait a bit longer to get Camille.
Kindred has been out for 550 days and still hasn't gone on sale so I wouldn't get your hopes up.
I love the peaceful contrast Sakura Karma provides compared to the other three.
